definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: People are doing their Christmas shopping.
sentences.chinese: 人們正在購買節日用品。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用電器，日用品，鐘錶電子產品手板製作。

sentences.english: The community also provides bedding and other disposable daily necessities for guests.
sentences.chinese: 該社區還給客人提供牀上用品和其他一次性日用品。

sentences.english: Blood and blood derivatives are considered a supply commodity or munition.
sentences.chinese: 血液和血液衍生品被認爲是日用品或軍需品。

sentences.english: They're a little-known commodity, I think, and little-understood.
sentences.chinese: 我想，它們是幾乎不爲人知也不爲人理解的日用品。

sentences.english: Manufacturers of fine quality down duvets and bed linens.
sentences.chinese: 高質量羽絨被和牀上日用品的生產商。

sentences.english: Our coated steel tubes can be widely used for home products and furniture.
sentences.chinese: 塑料包塑管可以廣泛用於日用品和家居設施等。

sentences.english: In order to provide guests a cozy atmosphere, the hostess has redecorated her home.
sentences.chinese: 該社區還給客人提供牀上用品和其他一次性日用品。

sentences.english: The government sets strict production limits for non-consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府對非日用品作出了嚴格的限產規定。

sentences.english: The co-op close by deals in articles of daily use.
sentences.chinese: 附近的合作社經售日用品。

sentences.english: He is the chief executive of Li &Fung, a company that sources more clothes and common household products from Asia than perhaps any other.
sentences.chinese: 利豐公司是亞洲地區服裝面料和日用品最大的採購商。

sentences.english: The outlook is bouncier in commodities and for the moment equities .
sentences.chinese: 日用品行業的前景更加不明確了，資產淨值也是如此。

sentences.english: This company is one of the earliest producers of household plastics in China.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是中國最主要的家庭塑料日用品生產商之一。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a kind of clother horse which is remade by using general clothes-hanger.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種曬衣架，屬日用品領域。

definition: needle and thread/sewing implements/needlework/(fig.) unimportant thing
stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)
